'''Crystal Cores''' are a crafting material obtained by catching [[Crystalflies]].

==How to Obtain==
This material is obtained from catching any type of crystalfly in the wild.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=90 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List}}
* Crystalflies will not spawn when it's raining.
** Since it doesn't rain in [[Dragonspine]], Crystalflies will always spawn there.
*[[Nahida]] remarks that you could easily mistake a Pyro Crystalfly for a firefly because both glow.
